original:
In India, various religious symbols and practices are commonly observed in workplaces, reflecting the diverse cultural landscape of the country. 

Hindu individuals often wear a tilaka on their foreheads, a mark that signifies their affiliation with Hinduism and is believed to bring success in daily activities. Hindu women frequently adorn themselves with a bindi on their foreheads. Married women may also wear a necklace known as a mang
sampled:
In India, various religious symbols and practices are commonly observed in workplaces, reflecting the diverse cultural landscape of the locale. 

Hindu individuals often wear a tilaka on their foreheads, a mark that signifies their affiliation with Hinduism and is believed to bring success in daily activities. Hindu women frequently adorn themselves in a bindi on their foreheads. Married women may also wear a necklace known as a mang
